snippet.title: 6  Security & Compliance in Legacy System Modernization
snippet.description:
🔐 Security & Compliance in Legacy System Modernization  
🎥 Episode 6 of 10 — Just Released

Legacy systems weren’t built for today’s threats.  
And yet, they’re still powering critical business operations. 😬

💣 Outdated security protocols  
⚠️ Gaps in compliance  
🔓 Vulnerabilities lurking in every corner

For CTOs, it’s a tightrope walk: Modernize too fast and risk exposure. Move too slow and invite disaster.

⚠️ In this 2-minute episode, we cover:
🔍 Why legacy systems are *inherently risky* in a modern security landscape  
🛡️ What compliance pitfalls most teams overlook  
✅ How NKD Agility embeds security-first principles into *every stage* of modernization

We don't just patch holes—we transform your legacy architecture into a secure, compliant foundation for the future.

💡 Think of it as modernization with a shield.

If you’re a CTO who loses sleep over audits, breaches, or operational blind spots—this is the episode that puts you back in control.

👇 Watch now. Follow for the full 10-part series.  Visit https://nkdagility.com/capabilities/azure-devops-migration-services/ if you need help with #azuredevops or #devopsmigration

#CTO #Cybersecurity #Compliance #LegacySystems #DevSecOps #EngineeringExcellence #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #SecureModernization
